DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study Using CALIBER® TLIF Expandable Spacer Treatment DDD : 2 Year Follow-up .
DOC.detailed_description: This multi center retrospective study 200 patient . Sites screen patient record patient TLIF utilize CALIBER® expandable interbody spacer conjunction REVOLVE® REVERE® posterior stabilization system subsequent follow-up visit . The study aim collect pre-operative post-operative data 6 , 12 24 month time point accord exist standard care surgeon 's custom practice .
